apps.name: Youtube (YTLitePlus)
apps.subtitle: YTLite with more features!
apps.versionDescription:
Current YouTube IPA: "18.35.4"  
Current YTLitePlus Version: "2.3.1"  
Current App Compatibility: "iOS/iPadOS 14.0" or later

RELEASE 18.35.4•2.3.1: (2023•09•08)

• Updated Youtube from "18.34.5" to "18.35.4"

Issues in this Release:
• LowContrastMode does not work (Compatible only with YouTube v16.05.7•v17.38.10)
• Shorts are not hidden everywhere (problem with YTLite tweak)
• VersionSpoofer (Lite) doesn't work with YTLite (as the version is already spoofed by YTLite to fix YTClassicVideoQuality)
• Age•restricted videos don't load correctly 29 (enable "Skip content warning" in YTlite settings to resolve this issue)
• VP9 (YTHUD) is currently broken, so resolutions higher than 1080p like 1440p or 4k won't work.
apps.localizedDescription:
YTLite with more features! 

Supercharge your YouTube experience with +15 tweaks: 

• YTLite: Ad-blocking & background playback, +50 options
• iSponsorBlock: Skip sponsor ads
• YouPiP: Native PiP mode
• YTUHD: 2K & 4K video quality
• YouTube Dislike Return: Reinstate dislike counts
• YTClassicVideoQuality: Old video quality selector
• YTNoHoverCards: Disable suggested videos
• YTABGoodies: Disable A/B testing features
• NOYTPremium: Remove Premium upsell alerts
• YTSpeed: Add 2.25x to 4x playback speeds
• YTMiniplayerEnabler: Enable Miniplayer
• DontEatMyContent: Prevent notch issues
• YTShortsProgress: Enable Shorts progress bar
• YTABConfig: Control A/B testing flags
• YouMute: Mute/unmute videos
• LowContrastMode: Reduce interface contrast
• And many more...

privacy.name: AppleMusic
privacy.usageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to your Apple Music library.

privacy.name: BluetoothPeripheral
privacy.usageDescription: YTLitePlus requires Bluetooth access to connect with nearby peripherals.

privacy.name: Camera
privacy.usageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to the camera to capture photos and videos.

privacy.name: Contacts
privacy.usageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to your contacts to help you share content with your friends.

privacy.name: LocalNetwork
privacy.usageDescription: YTLitePlus requires local network access to connect and communicate with nearby devices.

privacy.name: LocationWhenInUse
privacy.usageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to your location while using the app to provide personalized recommendations.

privacy.name: Microphone
privacy.usageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to your microphone to record audio.

privacy.name: PhotoLibrary
privacy.usageDescription: YTLitePlus requires access to your Photo Library to save photos and videos.

	• Added option to hide search history
	• Added option to remove videos section under the video player
	• Added option to stick sort buttons panel in comments section

Current YouTube IPA: "18.25.1"  
Current YTLitePlus Version: "2.2"  
Current App Compatibility: "iOS/iPadOS 14.0" or later

RELEASE 18.25.1•2.2: (2023•07•07)

• Updated YTLite from "2.1" to "2.2" (@dayanch96) 
  • Added:
    • Extra speed options
    • Auto fullscreen
    • Remove 'Play next in queue' from the menu
    • Remove 'Continue watching' block
  • Fixed:
    • 'Classic Video Quality' option for newer YT versions (See line 278)
    • 'Disable Double Tap To Seek' option for newer YT versions
    • Some Shorts was appearing in Search results
    • Enabled ads was displaying blank blocks instead of ads in home feed

• Added "YTNoCommunityPosts" (@arichorn)
    • Tweak to add a setting to disable all Community Posts on the YouTube app
  
• Added "AppVersionSpoofer" (@arichorn)
    • Mimic YouTube versions to access specific features, layouts, and resolve issues.

• Fixed issue 3 

Issues in this Release:
• LowContrastMode doesn't work (it work with older YT version)
• YTSpeed not working (both broken in v18.19.1+)

Current YouTube IPA: "v18.23.3"  
Current YTLite Version: "v2.1"  
Current App Compatibility: "iOS/iPadOS 14.0" or later

RELEASE 18.23.3•2.1: (June 27th 2023)

• Updated YTLite from "2.0" to "2.1"
  • Added option to Hide "Continue watching" carousel in Home Tab (Other tab)
  • Added option to remove "Play next in queue" in video menu (Other tab)
  • Improved No ads option
  • Improved No Shorts option
  • Fixed Related videos not working
  • Updated Simplified Chinese (Thanks to @xiangfeidexiaohuo)

Issues in this Release:
• LowContrastMode doesn't work (it work with older YT version)
• The old Darkmode doesn't work quite right

apps.name: Apollo for Reddit
apps.subtitle: The award-winning Reddit app
apps.versionDescription:
• Re Fix Imgur loading issue  

The Imgur client ID is tentatively created by me, but may stop if there are too many requests.

How to create

If you do not have an Imgur account, please create one:
https://imgur.com/

After creating an account, create an app from the following page
https://api.imgur.com/oauth2/addclient
Authorization type: is OK with "OAuth 2 authorization without a callback URL
Fill in the other fields to get a "Client ID".

https://imgur.com/account/settings/apps
You can also check the Client ID from the above link if you are logged in.

For sideloading, the IPA is available on the GitHub release page.
ApolloSideloadFix.dylib" and "ApolloPatcher.dylib" are already included, so all you need to do is install them from AltStore or other sources.

If you want to create your own IPA, please include ApolloSideloadFix.dylib.
apps.localizedDescription:
Apollo is an app for Reddit built for customizability, smoothness, gestures, and taking advantage of everything iOS has to offer. Apollo is a beautiful Reddit app built for fast navigation with an incredibly powerful set of features. Thanks to features like the Jump Bar, fully customizable gestures, and a super-charged Media Viewer, browsing Reddit has never been this amazing. It's created specifically with iOS design guidelines in mind, so it fits right at home on your device, and with input from thousands of Redditors helping sculpt and perfect it over several years before launching: 

- Jump Bar, for super-fast hopping between subreddits
- Super-charged Media Viewer for an amazing experience viewing images, GIFs, videos, albums, and more from a variety of sources.
- Tabbed interface for easy navigating
- Incredibly powerful Markdown composer for writing comments and posts
- Full inline Imgur uploading, both images and albums
- Large or compact posts depending on your preference
- Dark mode (can be automatic)
- Fully customizable gestures
- Safari View Controller for browsing articles and links
- Inline previews of media in comments
- 3D Touch support
- Beautifully organized Inbox
- Filtering and blocking
- Face ID / Touch ID / Passcode lock
- Moderator features
- Tons of settings to tweak
- GIF scrubbing to go backward and forward in time
- Multiple accounts
- Powerful search
- Full Markdown rendering
- Unobtrusive Volume Indicator

As well as much, much more and it's constantly evolving. If you have anything you'd specifically like to see, come to the ApolloApp subreddit and we'd love to hear it! Apollo is an unofficial app, and side effects may include an incredible browsing experience.

versions.localizedDescription:
• Re Fix Imgur loading issue  

The Imgur client ID is tentatively created by me, but may stop if there are too many requests.

How to create

If you do not have an Imgur account, please create one:
https://imgur.com/

After creating an account, create an app from the following page
https://api.imgur.com/oauth2/addclient
Authorization type: is OK with "OAuth 2 authorization without a callback URL
Fill in the other fields to get a "Client ID".

https://imgur.com/account/settings/apps
You can also check the Client ID from the above link if you are logged in.

For sideloading, the IPA is available on the GitHub release page.
ApolloSideloadFix.dylib" and "ApolloPatcher.dylib" are already included, so all you need to do is install them from AltStore or other sources.

If you want to create your own IPA, please include ApolloSideloadFix.dylib.

• Added: ApolloSideloadFix
This allows sideloaded apps to save the login state when exiting.
Credit @level3tjg
• Added: How to Use

privacy.name: LocationWhenInUse
privacy.usageDescription: App needs location when in use.

apps.name: Winston for Reddit
apps.subtitle: Winston, a beautiful and native Reddit client for iOS
apps.versionDescription:
This version is the first IPA available for download for people who can't use TestFlight for any reason.
We don't have a versioning system yet as well, so "0.1" is not exactly precise.
apps.localizedDescription:
Introducing Winston: 
 A Stunning and native Reddit client for iOS
- In-development, free, and open-source app and bot 
- User-friendly interface designed for easy navigation
- Compliance with Reddit's Terms of Service for a seamless experience
- Stay connected with the Reddit community in a sleek and intuitive way
- Experience the beauty of Winston, your ultimate iOS Reddit companion.

versions.localizedDescription:
This version is the first IPA available for download for people who can't use TestFlight for any reason.
We don't have a versioning system yet as well, so "0.1" is not exactly precise.

privacy.name: PhotoLibrary
privacy.usageDescription: Winston needs access to your library to be able to download images.

privacy.name: DocumentsFolder
privacy.usageDescription: Winston needs access to your documents to save/import themes.
